unnormalised: Arre yaar, India ani Pak-acho match kedna asa? Mhaka aikuk mell'llem ki 15/10/2024-ak asa, punn konn konn mhonta ki 14vi Oct-ak mukar kela mhunn. Ani kitlea vellar, bhai? To divos-raat-cho match asa vo 2:30 PM IST-ak suru zatlo poileam sarkho, vo anik kitem tori? Mhaka office-antlean chutti lavonk zai veginuch!
normalised: Arre yaar, India ani Pak-achi match kedna asa? Mhaka aikuk aila ki pandhra Octobar don hozar chovis-ak asa, punn konn tori chaudha Octobar-ak adhi karta mhonta. Ani kitlea vellar, bhau? Tem disa-ratichi match astam don tiss minttanchear P-M I-S-T suru zatali te bhaxen astali, vo aninkim kitem tori? Maka office-antlean chutti zata titlem vegim book korunk zai!
text: Arre yaar, India ani Pak-acho match kedna asa? Mhaka aikuk mell'llem ki 15/10/2024-ak asa, punn konn konn mhonta ki 14vi Oct-ak mukar kela mhunn. Ani kitlea vellar, bhai? To divos-raat-cho match asa vo 2:30 PM IST-ak suru zatlo poileam sarkho, vo anik kitem tori? Mhaka office-antlean chutti lavonk zai veginuch!
